thread.section_title: Premier Inn London City (Aldgate) Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Clean, modern and good service
thread.title_full: Clean, modern and good service - Review of Premier Inn London City (Aldgate) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Riversiderovers
title: Clean, modern and good service
text: A great example of what Premier Inn can do so well. Good location a few minutes walk from a tube station. Not the most attractive building from the outside but the inside was nicely decorated. My room was on the small side but was clean and had everything I needed. Dinner in the restaurant was served quickly by a charming waitress - standard food but it was OK. Breakfast was of usual standard too but I didn't have time to linger and take full advantage. Check in and out was efficient.
